title: Crash when attaching selection object to visual

content.raw:
It doesn't happen every time though. One way to reproduce:

1. Select the object

1. Press R/T/S

1. Crash

Backtrace:

~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff24dff10 in Ogre::SceneNode::getParentSceneNode() const ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.8.1
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff24dff10 in Ogre::SceneNode::getParentSceneNode() const ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.8.1
#1  0x00007ffff5e3e069 in gazebo::rendering::Visual::AttachVisual (this=0xa551940, _vis=...)
    at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:560
#2  0x00007ffff5e32249 in gazebo::rendering::SelectionObj::Attach (this=0x28f77a0, _vis=...)
    at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/SelectionObj.cc:149
#3  0x00007ffff798702b in gazebo::gui::ModelManipulator::SetAttachedVisual (
    this=0x7ffff7dd4fd0 <SingletonT<gazebo::gui::ModelManipulator>::GetInstance()::t>, _vis=...)
    at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/ModelManipulator.cc:875
#4  0x00007ffff793ea5d in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnManipMode (this=0x1873ca0, _mode=...)
    at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:1129
#5  0x00007ffff7979d12 in boost::function1<void, std::string>::operator() (this=0x1880860, a0=...)
    at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:767
#6  0x00007ffff7979e39 in gazebo::event::EventT<void (std::string)>::Signal<char [7]>(char const (&) [7]) (this=<optimized out>, _p=...) at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:380
#7  0x00007ffff74c487a in QMetaObject::activate(QObject*, QMetaObject const*, int, void**) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#8  0x00007ffff2a7da62 in QAction::triggered(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#9  0x00007ffff2a7f433 in QAction::activate(QAction::ActionEvent) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#10 0x00007ffff793f033 in trigger (this=<optimized out>) at /usr/include/qt4/QtGui/qaction.h:218
#11 gazebo::gui::GLWidget::keyReleaseEvent (this=0x1873ca0, _event=0x7fffffffd3c0)
    at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:422
#12 0x00007ffff2ad30fd in QWidget::event(QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#13 0x00007ffff2a83e2c in QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#14 0x00007ffff2a8b6f1 in QApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#15 0x00007ffff74b04dd in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#16 0x00007ffff2b23027 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#17 0x00007ffff2b233c9 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#18 0x00007ffff2afd417 in QApplication::x11ProcessEvent(_XEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#19 0x00007ffff2b25b32 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#20 0x00007fffefe51e04 in g_main_context_dispatch () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#21 0x00007fffefe52048 in ?? () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#22 0x00007fffefe520ec in g_main_context_iteration () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#23 0x00007ffff74dd7a1 in QEventDispatcherGlib::processEvents(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#24 0x00007ffff2b25be6 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#25 0x00007ffff74af0af in QEventLoop::processEvents(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#26 0x00007ffff74af3a5 in QEventLoop::exec(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#27 0x00007ffff74b4b79 in QCoreApplication::exec() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#28 0x00007ffff794a3eb in gazebo::gui::run (_argc=_argc@entry=1, _argv=_argv@entry=0x7fffffffdf48)
    at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc:315
#29 0x000000000040133a in main (_argc=1, _argv=0x7fffffffdf48)
    at /home/louise/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/main.cc:25
~~~

It doesn't happen every time though. One way to reproduce:

  2. Press R/T/S
